articles.description: Beijing has locked down another two districts under its Zero-Covid policy putting thousands of people under harsh restrictions with just four days left to go until the Winter Olympics begin.
articles.content:
Beijing has locked down two more districts of Beijing after 23 new Covid cases were reported over the weekend, putting thousands of people under restrictions.
With only four days to go until the Win… [+19261 chars]
